tossup_question: -   –  How many faces does a regular icosahedron have?
bonus_question: -   –  You have a sample of 30 values that correspond to the amount of money you spent on gas each month. You notice that the highest value was mistakenly recorded with an extra zero, but after correcting it, it remains the highest value. Identify all of the following three values that change after the correction: 1) Mean; 2) Median; 3) Range
